and the Philadelphia 76ers keep winning. One night after a 41-point effort in Philadelphia's most lopsided win of the season, Allen Iverson scored an NBA season-high and career-best 54 in a 107-103 victory over the James Cleveland Cavaliers. It was like he was playing horse tonight, said 76ers guard Aaron McKie , who had 20 points and nine assists.`` His jumper was deadly.'' and says she can see similarities between her on-screen role and the pop mogul.`` If ever there was a guy who tells it like it is, then it's Simon Cowell ,'' Jane Lynch explains. You could definitely look at Sue and say there's a lot of Simon Cowell in her. He's a great inspiration for the character. Jane Lynch went on to tell The Sun:`` Simon Cowell and Sue say the things people wish they could in their jobs or at their school, but can't because it's not the done thing. Just like him, she says what she wants because she can. the proposal. Mr Sergio Marchionne praised the Mirafiori workers for voting in favour of the labour reforms. He said they were standing up against`` decline'' and`` extremism''. This was notable in a country like Italy that has always been tied to the past and resistant to change, he said. Italian leaders and unionists had said that the result of the Mirafiori vote had implications far beyond the limits of Turin. want the Bill Clinton and Congress to work together on the big issues, not least the economy. Larry Sabato said the Republican takeover of the House of Representatives gives the Bill Clinton a new political lease on life. Once the Tea Party members of the House start having a full airing of their views, Barack Obama will appear more moderate. He's going to be nicely positioned between the old Barack Obama and the new Republican House. I've said for more than a year that if the Democrats hold both the House and the Senate Barack Obama might be a one-term Bill Clinton . Now he has someone to blame and someone to make him to look better.
